4ZqJSfV4818.title: AutoGen Studio 2.0 Tutorial - Skills, Multi-Agent Teams, and REAL WORLD Use Cases (NO CODE)
4ZqJSfV4818.author: Matthew Berman
4ZqJSfV4818.description:
Let's build an AutoGen team to take a YouTube video, retrieve its transcript, and then create a blog post and tweet thread from it. We'll use the newest version of AutoGen Studio and I'll show you how to use Agent Skills.
